lore:
The Deathless Legions

The Ossiarch Bonereapers are the elite undead warriors of Nagash, the Supreme Lord of the Undead. Unlike the mindless shambling hordes of other undead, the Ossiarch Bonereapers are intelligent, disciplined, and utterly devoted to their master's will.

The Great Work

Created by Nagash through the Great Work, the Ossiarch Bonereapers are not simply reanimated corpses, but carefully crafted undead warriors. Each one is built from the bones of countless fallen warriors, their souls bound together and shaped into the perfect instruments of death.

Bone Tithe

The Ossiarch Bonereapers collect the Bone Tithe from all the realms, gathering the remains of the fallen to fuel their endless armies. This is not mere collection - it is a systematic, organized process that ensures Nagash's legions never run short of material for their undead warriors.

Mortisan Hierarchy

The Ossiarch Bonereapers are led by the Mortisan - powerful necromancers who serve as both commanders and craftsmen. These undead sorcerers are responsible for maintaining the legions, creating new warriors, and ensuring that Nagash's will is carried out with perfect precision.

Spearhead Operations

In the smaller conflicts of the Spearhead campaigns, the Ossiarch Bonereapers deploy their most versatile warriors. Mortek Guard form the backbone of their forces - heavily armored, disciplined, and utterly devoted to Nagash's cause. Kavalos Deathriders provide mobility and shock tactics, while Mortisan Soulmasons bring devastating necromantic magic to the battlefield.

Every Ossiarch Bonereaper fights not for personal glory, but for the eternal dominion of Nagash. They are the deathless legions that will conquer all the realms, the perfect warriors of an undying empire.

armyRules.name: Ossiarch Commands
armyRules.description: OSSIARCH COMMANDS are abilities that can only be used by spending Ossiarch command points. At the start of the battle round, you receive 2 Ossiarch command points. Each OSSIARCH COMMAND costs 1 Ossiarch command point to use. The same unit cannot use more than one OSSIARCH COMMAND in the same phase. At the end of the battle round, all remaining Ossiarch command points are lost.

armyRules.name: Reserve Contingent
armyRules.description: One of your Mortek Guard units is not set up during the deployment phase. Instead, from the third battle round onwards, it can use the Contingent Arrival ability.

armyRules.name: Contingent Arrival
armyRules.description: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 3" of a battlefield edge and more than 6" from all enemy units.

regimentAbilities.name: Impenetrable Ranks (OSSIARCH COMMAND)
regimentAbilities.frequency: Once per battle, any combat phase
regimentAbilities.description: Pick a friendly unit to use this ability. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to ward rolls for that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Re-form Ranks (OSSIARCH COMMAND)
regimentAbilities.frequency: Once per battle, your movement phase
regimentAbilities.description: Pick a friendly Mortek Guard unit in combat to use this ability. That unit can use a RETREAT ability this phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

enhancements.name: Murderous Drive
enhancements.description: Your general's Soulreaper Scythe has Crit (2 Hits).

ability.name: Crit (2 Hits)
ability.description: If you roll a Critical Hit when attacking with this weapon, that attack inflicts 2 hits instead of 1.

enhancements.name: Unstoppable Commander
enhancements.description: Declare: Pick a friendly Mortek Guard unit wholly within 12" of your general, then roll a dice. Effect: On a 2+, add 3" to that unit's Move characteristic this phase.

ability.name: Unstoppable Commander
ability.description: Declare: Pick a friendly Mortek Guard unit wholly within 12" of your general, then roll a dice. Effect: On a 2+, add 3" to that unit's Move characteristic this phase.

enhancements.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
enhancements.description: Declare: Pick a visible friendly Mortek Guard unit wholly within 12" of your general, then make a casting roll of 2D6. Effect: On a 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit's melee weapons.

ability.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
ability.description: Declare: Pick a visible friendly Mortek Guard unit wholly within 12" of your general, then make a casting roll of 2D6. Effect: On a 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit's melee weapons.

enhancements.name: Marrowpact
enhancements.description: Each time your general uses a FIGHT ability, after all of their attacks have been resolved, Heal (X) your general where X is the number of damage points allocated by those attacks.

ability.name: Marrowpact
ability.description: Each time your general uses a FIGHT ability, after all of their attacks have been resolved, Heal (X) your general where X is the number of damage points allocated by those attacks.

abilities.name: DRAIN VITALITY
abilities.description: Declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6. Effect: On a 6+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by the target unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Deathly Invigoration (OSSIARCH COMMAND)
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit wholly within 12" of this model. If you do so, heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that unit.

abilities.name: Anti-charge (+1 rend)
abilities.description: If this unit is charged, add 1 to the rend characteristic of this weapon.

abilities.name: NADIRITE ASSAULT (OSSIARCH COMMAND)
abilities.description: Until the end of the phase, this unit’s melee weapons have Crit (2 Hits).

abilities.name: Charge (+1 damage)
abilities.description: Add 1 to the damage characteristic of this weapon if the target made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: DEATHRIDER WEDGE (OSSIARCH COMMAND)
abilities.description: Models in this unit can pass across enemy Infantry models as if this unit had Fly. After this unit has charged, you can pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit and roll a dice. If the roll is 2+, inflict D3 mortal wounds on that unit.

abilities.name: Bone Harvest
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, for each enemy model that was slain by wounds caused by this model's attacks in that phase, you gain 1 Blood Tithe point, to a maximum of 6.

abilities.name: Repair Construct
abilities.description: Pick a Mortek Guard unit wholly within 6" of this model. Then roll a dice for each Blood Tithe point you have. For Each 4+ you can return one slain model to that unit. then set your blood tithe points to 0.
